title: Market Simulator
summary: A simulation environment for testing algorithmic trading strategies.

title: Traffic Accident Severity Prediction
summary: A lightweight ML app that predicts traffic accident severity using weather, time, and location features; includes a fast user demo.

title: Advice Aggregator Website
summary: An ongoing web app that scrapes and clusters advice across multiple online sources. Uses NLP techniques to group similar insights and display them in a clean, searchable interface.
